verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> unto the LORD <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>: because his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let Israel <WH3478> now say <WH559>, that his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let the house <WH1004> of Aaron <WH175> now say <WH559>, that his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let them now that fear <WH3373> the LORD <WH3068> say <WH559>, that his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
I called <WH7121> upon the LORD <WH3050> in distress <WH4712>: the LORD <WH3050> answered <WH6030> me, and set me in a large place <WH4800>. in distress: Heb. out of distress
The LORD <WH3068> is on my side; I will not fear <WH3372>: what can <WH6213> man <WH120> do <WH6213> unto me? on: Heb. for me
The LORD <WH3068> taketh my part with them that help <WH5826> me: therefore shall I see <WH7200> my desire upon them that hate <WH8130> me.
It is better <WH2896> to trust <WH2620> in the LORD <WH3068> than to put confidence <WH982> in man <WH120>.
It is better <WH2896> to trust <WH2620> in the LORD <WH3068> than to put confidence <WH982> in princes <WH5081>.
All nations <WH1471> compassed me about <WH5437>: but in the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> will I destroy <WH4135> them. destroy: Heb. cut them off
They compassed me about <WH5437>; yea, they compassed me about <WH5437>: but in the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> I will destroy <WH4135> them.

They compassed me about <WH5437> like bees <WH1682>; they are quenched <WH1846> as the fire <WH784> of thorns <WH6975>: for in the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> I will destroy <WH4135> them. destroy: Heb. cut down
Thou hast thrust <WH1760> sore <WH1760> at me that I might fall <WH5307>: but the LORD <WH3068> helped <WH5826> me.
The LORD <WH3050> is my strength <WH5797> and song <WH2176>, and is become my salvation <WH3444>.

The voice <WH6963> of rejoicing <WH7440> and salvation <WH3444> is in the tabernacles <WH168> of the righteous <WH6662>: the right hand <WH3225> of the LORD <WH3068> doeth <WH6213> valiantly <WH2428>.
The right hand <WH3225> of the LORD <WH3068> is exalted <WH7426>: the right hand <WH3225> of the LORD <WH3068> doeth <WH6213> valiantly <WH2428>.
I shall not die <WH4191>, but live <WH2421>, and declare <WH5608> the works <WH4639> of the LORD <WH3050>.
The LORD <WH3050> hath chastened <WH3256> me sore <WH3256>: but he hath not given me over <WH5414> unto death <WH4194>.
Open <WH6605> to me the gates <WH8179> of righteousness <WH6664>: I will go <WH935> into them, and I will praise <WH3034> the LORD <WH3050>:
This gate <WH8179> of the LORD <WH3068>, into which the righteous <WH6662> shall enter <WH935>.
I will praise <WH3034> thee: for thou hast heard <WH6030> me, and art become my salvation <WH3444>.
The stone <WH68> which the builders <WH1129> refused <WH3988> is become the head <WH7218> stone of the corner <WH6438>.
This is the LORD'S <WH3068> doing; it is marvellous <WH6381> in our eyes <WH5869>. the LORD's: Heb. from the LORD
This is the day <WH3117> which the LORD <WH3068> hath made <WH6213>; we will rejoice <WH1523> and be glad <WH8055> in it.
Save <WH3467> now, I beseech <WH577> thee, O LORD <WH3068>: O LORD <WH3068>, I beseech <WH577> thee, send now prosperity <WH6743>.
Blessed <WH1288> be he that cometh <WH935> in the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068>: we have blessed <WH1288> you out of the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>.
God <WH410> is the LORD <WH3068>, which hath shewed us light <WH215>: bind <WH631> the sacrifice <WH2282> with cords <WH5688>, even unto the horns <WH7161> of the altar <WH4196>.
Thou art my God <WH410>, and I will praise <WH3034> thee: thou art my God <WH430>, I will exalt <WH7311> thee.
O give thanks <WH3034> unto the LORD <WH3068>; for he is good <WH2896>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
